sources.description:
Pietschnig and Voracek (2015)
Data providerPietschnig and Voracek (2015)
SourceJakob Pietschnig and Martin Voracek
DescriptionChanges in fluid, spatial, full-scale, and crystallized IQs for regions and countries
Linkhttp://pps.sagepub.com/content/10/3/282.abstract
Retrieved21/07/2015

Additional information

The data is not publically available, please contact the authors directly if you would like access to the data. 

Citation: Pietschnig, Jakob, and Martin Voracek. "One Century of Global IQ Gains A Formal Meta-Analysis of the Flynn Effect (1909–2013)." Perspectives on Psychological Science 10, no. 3 (2015): 282-306.

variables.name: Fullscale IQ change by region 1909-2013 (Pietschnig and Voracek, 2015)
